mediately halt the behaviors we just saw right now.   Leo knows him best so=

e would have a lot of us turning a nice shade of white right about now."

> Rattrap nods.

rk too well without the big guy here.  We really need ta find him.  No offe=
nse but, he's the one who put this together and I don't think Hydras can ke=

> " Two dragons are better than one....  Master Yoketron once =
said that when he was training my brother and Nightshift.  Leo, That's it! =
 Rattrap's right!  We need ta find my brother before all else!  Hydras!  Yo=
u'll think I'm off my rocker but believe me if Master Yoketron said this it=
's gotta be true!  Two dragons are better than one.  One representing good =
and the other representing evil.  One balances out the other and together t=
hey form a power which can stand to be undefeated.  It's an old tale but it=

d on how things play out.  You gotta find my brother and bring him back her=
e.. ta Hydras.  Hydras, you and Tucson are those dragons.  Together you can=

 Okay that might be pushing it but it's so worth a try."


That earned a la=
ugh from DINOBOT, "Oh, waht is this about DRAGONS?  WOuld not your sensei h=
ave told you that is it not the alt mode, but the spark wtihin?  An alt mod=
e is merely a shell of what is.  To be changed as necessary,b ut no more us=
eful than any other.  A dragon..  Is a popular but a sign of weakness.  For=
 it is a sign of one who thinks bigger is better.  But it is a sign of weak=
ness."

Grinning, "And you Maximals seem to lose sight so easily, upon gett=
ing orders within nanoclicks you are back to baiting again.  And what would=
 your sensei think of a pack of you going around like addled protoforms?"

=
Grinning, "And yes, Yoketron.  I believe my own..  Teacher knew him well."
=

Laughing, "Right before he tore out the senile old one's spark.  Knowledge=
 of many styles, master of none, he fell so easily in the end."  Whether a =
more blatant baiting or not now..

Grinning, "And I believe BLUDGEON sent h=
is regards when his shredded old carcass was sent to whatever Pit you Maxim=
als dig up your useless warriors from and asked for a refund.  He was hardl=
y a fight."

Whether hte words were true or not, the name of BLUDGEON, the =

"I believe Bl=
udgeon said 'send my regards to those whom you will be joining I have alrea=
dy sent, and he met his oblivion'."  Grinning ferally as he gave a mocking =
